TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HyperLinkDataBindingHandler extends System.Web.UI.Design.DataBindingHandler

summary.span: 提供超链接属性的数据绑定处理程序。

span.span: Provides a data-binding handler for a hyperlink property.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个名为的类 `CustomHyperLinkDataBindingHandler` ，该类派生自 `HyperLinkDataBindingHandler` 类。The following code example creates a class, named `CustomHyperLinkDataBindingHandler`, which derives from the `HyperLinkDataBindingHandler` class. 它使用方法解析类的设计时数据绑定 `CustomHyperLink` 。It resolves design-time data binding for the `CustomHyperLink` class using the method. MemberSignature.Value: public override void DataBindControl (System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost designerHost, System.Web.UI.Control control);

Public Overrides Sub DataBindControl (designerHost As IDesignerHost, control As Control)
public: override void DataBindControl(System::ComponentModel::Design::IDesignerHost ^ designerHost, System::Web::UI::Control ^ control);

span.span: The for the document that contains the control.

summary.span: 为指定控件解析设计时数据绑定。

span.span: Resolves design-time data-binding for the specified control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法确定控件的 和 属性是否 是数据绑定的。This method determines whether the and properties of the control are data-bound. 如果该 属性是数据绑定的，则此方法会将属性的值设置为 "数据绑定"。If the property is data-bound, this method sets the value of the property to "DataBound". 如果 属性是数据绑定的，则此方法会将属性的值设置为文本字符串，以便控件具有工作超链接的外观。If the property is data-bound, this method sets the value of the property to a text string so the control will have the appearance of a working hyperlink. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个名为的类 `CustomHyperLinkDataBindingHandler` ，该类派生自 `HyperLinkDataBindingHandler` 类。The following code example creates a class, named `CustomHyperLinkDataBindingHandler`, which derives from the `HyperLinkDataBindingHandler` class. 它解析类的属性的设计时数据绑定， `CustomHyperLink` 以便在设计时数据绑定时为属性显示占位符文本。It resolves design-time data binding for the property of the `CustomHyperLink` class so that placeholder text is displayed for the property when it is data-bound at design time. [!code-csharp[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/CS/CustomHyperLinkDesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/VB/customhyperlinkdesigner.vb#2)]
